text: Charles Henry "Charlie" Joachim (July 21, 1920 – March 17, 2002) was an American professional basketball player who played in the National Basketball League for the Youngstown Bears and Flint Dow A.C.'s. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Flint Dow A.C.'s players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:Mount Union Purple Raiders men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Youngstown, Ohio Category:Youngstown Bears players Category:American men's basketball players
title: Charlie Joachim
